name: BakingIngredients
0:
”Alexa, ask baking ingredients help me weigh one cup of bread flour”
”Alexa, ask baking ingredients convert two tablespoons of malt syrup”
”Alexa, ask baking ingredients how much does half of a cup of bread flour weigh”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baking ingredients
des:
Need help converting ingredients for your next baking recipe? This skill enables you to quickly ask Alexa about over 200 commonly used baking ingredients. Easily convert ingredients from cups, tablespoons, and teaspoons to ounces and grams.

For best results, we recommend weighing your ingredients with a digital scale.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
